title: PWD Recruitment 2017, Physically Handicapped Jobs 2017 (24 Vacancies)
text:
Physically Handicapped (PH) / Physically Challenged Job Seekers get latest Government Jobs for Person with Disability (PWD) Category Recruitment / Notification here. IndGovtJobs Blog listing every week PH / PWD / Physically Disabled Govt Job Opportunities details, Listed in the following table. 
Educational Qualification : Matriculation / 10th with 12th Class Pass / Graduate. 
PWD Category : Visual Impairment, Locomotor / Orthopedic Disability, Speech and Hearing Disability, Multiple Disabilities.
